search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Ashby (ashby.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Ashby can be found at this URL: [https://www.ashbyhq.com/pricing](https://www.ashbyhq.com/pricing) .

extracted_content.content:
![Image 1: Ashby All-In-One for Startups](https://www.ashbyhq.com/images/product/startups-icon.svg)

All-In-One
----------

Foundations Plan
----------------

Up to 100 employees
-------------------

Company size

Payment term

Total
-----

$

400

/Month
----------------

Get started within minutes, scales with you for years.

10% discount for annual commitments available.

Emerging market pricing available.

![Image 2: Ashby All-In-One for Growth](https://www.ashbyhq.com/images/product/growth-icon.svg)

All-In-One
----------

Plus Plan
---------

Best for 101 - 1000 employees
-----------------------------

A powerful all-in-one recruiting product built for scale.

Our pricing is based on company size, usage, and commitment. Our product is competitive with industry leaders and offers a complete, cost-saving solution.

![Image 3: Ashby All-In-One for Enterprise](https://www.ashbyhq.com/images/product/enterprise-icon.svg)

All-In-One
----------

Enterprise Plan
---------------

Best for 1,000+ employees
-------------------------

An enterprise-grade, all-in-one recruiting solution that supports large organizations.

For Enterprise plan accounts we offer a predictable pricing model helping you consolidate and simplify your spend.

![Image 4: Ashby Analytics for your existing ATS](https://www.ashbyhq.com/images/product/analytics-hero-icon.svg)

Ashby Analytics
---------------

For your existing ATS
---------------------

100+ Employees
--------------

Advanced reporting on top of your existing recruiting tools. Compare build vs. buy choices [here.](https://www.ashbyhq.com/blog/recruiting/build-vs-buy)

We integrate with your existing tools to supercharge your data with real-time, actionable, and goal-oriented analytics from your ATS. Pricing is based on usage.

> We just switched from a _Legacy ATS_. Ashby combines the functionality of sourcing, outreach, applicant tracking, analytics, scheduling automation and more. I wish Ashby had been around when we launched so we could have just started with them from the beginning.

Ashby pricing for our all-in-one recruiting and analytics tool

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Pricing varies based on company size, usage, and commitment. Discounts available for annual commitments and emerging markets.
